con:testCase.name: GoodCases-DEV-CAMT054.001.08-Credit
con:testCase.con:description: Based on use story: https://jira.telefonica.de/browse/DRC-4867 Create camt054 file in version 001.08, load to mft and process file.

con:config.script: // Generate msisdn in format defined by mock-services piranha and ocs-10 and save in test-case properties. testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue('MSISDN-Unknown',context.expand( '${#Project#MSISDN-chargeCustomer-OK}' ))

con:elements.con:expectedValue: Piranha-StackService.getStackDetails: Return response for request with MSISDN: ${#TestCase#MSISDN}
Piranha-StackService.getStackDetails: Return response for request with MSISDN: ${#TestCase#MSISDN}
OCS10-BalanceManagement.rechargeAccount: Return response for request with msisdn ${#TestCase#MSISDN}
